item.title: Software Quality Isn't (Just) About Software
item.description: Code quality isn’t just a nice-to-have to promote developer happiness; rather it is an integral component of meeting business needs. High quality code directly improves business outcomes by making it easier for developers to maintain code and scale it to meet future needs.

item.title: Personal Digital Security
item.description: While it is impossible to eliminate 100% of risk, there are a few (relatively) simple things you can do to reduce your risk in a meaningful way and help limit the blast radius if your password is compromised.
